about_the_game:
Venture into the Ruins, Unveil the Apocalypse’s Secrets, and Survive!

In the ruined city of Sunset Town, destroyed by a solar flare, you’ll play as a brave investigator embarking on an unknown adventure. Each exploration could be an entirely new challenge. Faced with mutated creatures, hostile factions, and the unforgiving environment, will you survive?

Game Features:

  • Randomly Generated City Areas
    Each time you play, the city map is randomly generated. Abandoned factories, dark underground tunnels, perilous streets—every corner is an unknown adventure! Every challenge is different, keeping the experience fresh.

  • Hardcore Survival
    Hunger, thirst, radiation... You’ll need to constantly monitor your survival indicators. Scavenge food, water, and medical supplies in the ruins. Use limited resources to craft tools, weapons, and fight to stay alive in extreme conditions!

  • Diverse Weapons and Equipment
    From crude homemade weapons to high-end firearms, from tattered armor to reinforced bulletproof vests, collect, craft, and upgrade your gear to create your ultimate post-apocalyptic survival kit. Choose the best weapons to take on mutants and hostile forces!

  • Unique Exploration Experience
    Featuring a "scavenge" gameplay mechanic, plan your route wisely to find the best survival strategy. Every exploration could uncover new secrets, hidden resources, or unknown enemies, providing depth and strategic challenges.

Gameplay:

  • Start from the Shelter
    Each game begins in the safety of your shelter. With limited supplies, embark on a journey filled with uncertainty. Only by staying vigilant will you survive in this post-apocalyptic world.

  • Explore Random Areas
    Traverse randomly generated city areas, head to investigation points, and explore abandoned buildings, contaminated facilities, and dangerous streets. Every exploration is filled with surprises and challenges. Seek vital supplies and uncover deeper secrets.

  • Fight Enemies
    Face off against mutants, hostile factions, and more threats. Use various weapons and traps to battle. Every fight could be life or death, so stay ready to face waves of enemies.

  • Manage Survival Indicators
    Survival is more than just combat! Monitor hunger, thirst, radiation, and other critical survival metrics. Keep food, water, and medicine stocked up to avoid falling into danger.

  • Strengthen Yourself
    Gather resources, craft tools and weapons, and upgrade your gear to enhance your survival abilities. Every upgrade brings you one step closer to completing your investigation.

  • Unveil the Truth
    Overcome numerous dangers and reach your final destination. Uncover the truth behind the apocalypse and complete your investigation!
